trans-unit.source: Exposes <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonSplitButton" /> types to UI Automation.
trans-unit.target: Expõe tipos <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonSplitButton" /> à Automação de Interface do Usuário.

trans-unit.source: The element associated with this automation peer.
trans-unit.target: O elemento associado a este par de automação.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonSplitButtonAutomationPeer" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonSplitButtonAutomationPeer" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets the control type for the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonSplitButton" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonSplitButtonAutomationPeer" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o tipo de controle para o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonSplitButton" /> associado a este <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonSplitButtonAutomationPeer" />.

trans-unit.source: This method is called by <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetAutomationControlType" />.
trans-unit.target: Este método é chamado por <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetAutomationControlType" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="F:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationControlType.SplitButton" /> enumeration value.
trans-unit.target: O valor de enumeração <see cref="F:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationControlType.SplitButton" />.

trans-unit.source: A value enumeration that specifies the control pattern.
trans-unit.target: Uma enumeração de valor que especifica o padrão de controle.

trans-unit.source: Gets the control pattern for the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonSplitButton" /> that is associated with the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonSplitButtonAutomationPeer" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o padrão de controle para o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonSplitButton" /> associado ao <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonSplitButtonAutomationPeer" />.

trans-unit.source: An object that supports the control pattern if <paramref name="patternInterface" /> is a supported value; otherwise, <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: Um objeto que é compatível com o padrão de controle se <paramref name="patternInterface" /> é for um valor compatível; caso contrário, <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: If one of the following cases occurs, this method returns an object that supports the specified control pattern.
trans-unit.target: Se uma das seguintes situações ocorrer, esse método retorna um objeto que suporta o padrão de controle especificado.

trans-unit.source: `patternInterface` equals <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface.Toggle> and the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonSplitButton> that is associated with this <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonSplitButtonAutomationPeer> can be checked.
trans-unit.target: `patternInterface` é igual a <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface.Toggle> e <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonSplitButton> que é associada a essa <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonSplitButtonAutomationPeer> pode ser verificada.

trans-unit.source: `patternInterface` equals <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface.Invoke> and the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonSplitButton> that is associated with this <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonSplitButtonAutomationPeer> cannot be checked.
trans-unit.target: `patternInterface` é igual a <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface.Invoke> e <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonSplitButton> que é associada a essa <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonSplitButtonAutomationPeer> não pode ser verificada.

trans-unit.source: `patternInterface` equals <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface.ExpandCollapse>.
trans-unit.target: `patternInterface` é igual a <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface.ExpandCollapse>.

trans-unit.source: `patternInterface` equals <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface.Scroll>.
trans-unit.target: `patternInterface` é igual a <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface.Scroll>.

trans-unit.source: `patternInterface` equals <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface.Transform>.
trans-unit.target: `patternInterface` é igual a <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface.Transform>.

trans-unit.source: `patternInterface` equals <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface.ItemContainer>.
trans-unit.target: `patternInterface` é igual a <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface.ItemContainer>.

trans-unit.source: `patternInterface` equals <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface.SynchronizedInput>.
trans-unit.target: `patternInterface` é igual a <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface.SynchronizedInput>.

trans-unit.source: Sends a request to activate the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonSplitButton" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonSplitButtonAutomationPeer" />.
trans-unit.target: Envia uma solicitação para ativar o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonSplitButton" /> associado a este <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonSplitButtonAutomationPeer" />.

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: Este membro é uma implementação do membro de interface explícita.

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonSplitButtonAutomationPeer> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.IInvokeProvider> interface.
trans-unit.target: Ele só pode ser usado quando a instância de <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonSplitButtonAutomationPeer> é convertida em uma interface de <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.IInvokeProvider>.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonSplitButton" /> is not enabled.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonSplitButton" /> não está habilitado.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonSplitButton" /> can be checked.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonSplitButton" /> pode ser verificado.

trans-unit.source: Use <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonSplitButtonAutomationPeer.System#Windows#Automation#Provider#IToggleProvider#Toggle" /> instead.
trans-unit.target: Use <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonSplitButtonAutomationPeer.System#Windows#Automation#Provider#IToggleProvider#Toggle" /> em seu lugar.

trans-unit.source: Cycles through the checked states of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonSplitButton" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonSplitButtonAutomationPeer" />.
trans-unit.target: Alterna entre os estados de ativação do <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonSplitButton" /> associado a este <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonSplitButtonAutomationPeer" />.

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: Este membro é uma implementação do membro de interface explícita.

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonSplitButtonAutomationPeer> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.IToggleProvider> interface.
trans-unit.target: Ele só pode ser usado quando a instância de <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonSplitButtonAutomationPeer> é convertida em uma interface de <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.IToggleProvider>.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonSplitButton" /> is not enabled.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonSplitButton" /> não está habilitado.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonSplitButton" /> cannot be checked.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonSplitButton" /> não pode ser marcado.

trans-unit.source: Gets the checked state of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonSplitButton" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonSplitButtonAutomationPeer" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o estado marcado do <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonSplitButton" /> associado a este <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonSplitButtonAutomationPeer" />.

trans-unit.source: The checked state of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonSplitButton" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonSplitButtonAutomationPeer" />.
trans-unit.target: O estado verificado do <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonSplitButton" /> que é associada a essa <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonSplitButtonAutomationPeer" />.

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: Este membro é uma implementação do membro de interface explícita.

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonSplitButtonAutomationPeer> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.IToggleProvider> interface.
trans-unit.target: Ele só pode ser usado quando a instância de <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonSplitButtonAutomationPeer> é convertida em uma interface de <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.IToggleProvider>.
